price: 43. Tai yra Pragaras, kurį Al-Mudžrimūn (politeistai, nusikaltėliai, nuodėmiautojai) neigė.
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
